Project.name: Deck
Project.description: Deck is a dynamic news aggregation platform that uses React for a responsive frontend, Flask for efficient backend operations, and APIs like News API and Reddit API to fetch real-time news. It features Google OAuth for secure login, web scraping with BeautifulSoup, and a customizable dashboard for a comprehensive news experience.

Project.name: Scikit-learn in C++
Project.description: This project involves implementing machine learning algorithms like Linear Regression, Decision Trees, and Naive Bayes from scratch in C++ to understand their inner workings. It highlights algorithmic details and applies efficient coding practices.

Project.name: AI Customer Support
Project.description: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system integrating Pinecone for vector search and LLaMA 13B for AI-driven customer support. It features a Flask-based API to handle user queries with precise and contextually relevant responses.

Project.name: EleutherAI GPT-Neo News Generator
Project.description: A news generator leveraging EleutherAI's GPT-Neo 125M model to create contextually accurate and diverse news articles, showcasing the capabilities of modern language models.

Project.name: Livable Streets Project
Project.description: An analysis of the impact of bike infrastructure on displacement and businesses, combining survey data with advanced data visualization techniques in a research-driven approach.

Project.name: AI Flashcards
Project.description: An AI-powered flashcard application built with React and Material-UI, offering a user-friendly interface and features like responsive design, customization, and efficient state management.

Project.name: Virtual Assistant
Project.description: A custom-built virtual assistant integrating advanced NLP and intent recognition models, featuring tools for natural language processing and automation using frameworks like BERT.
